evidence.claim: Flavor AI uses AWS services like Lambda and S3 for their infrastructure.
The company states they have HIPAA compliant APIs for handling health data.
Flavor AI mentions FHIR and HL7 compliance in their API documentation for health-tech integrations.
Integration with EHR systems is a highlighted feature in their technical specifications.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of handling X12 transactions or clearinghouse functions.
